attributes.action: not change the makeup of the house of Lords without a referendum of the British people.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The house of lords has worked as it does for many centuries.

To change one of the backbones of our law making process without proper consultation of the British public is reckless.

The people of this country should have a direct say in a decision as important as this.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
